rewrite1:
Adjust the formatting for the tenth paragraph by centering the text and switching the font to Calibri.

For the fourth paragraph, set it to Level 1 Outline. Change the font color to hex #FFFF00 and apply a text highlight with the color hex #FF00FF. Additionally, italicize the entire paragraph.

In the eighth paragraph, insert an 8 pt space before and an 8 pt space after the text. Modify the font size to 16 points and highlight the text using hex code #FF00FF.
rewrite2:
Please adjust the formatting for the tenth paragraph by centering the text and switching the font to Calibri.

For the fourth paragraph, apply a Level 1 Outline style. Also, format the text color using the hex code #FFFF00, highlight the background with hex code #FF00FF, and italicize the text for emphasis.

In the eighth paragraph, add a space of 8 points both before and after the paragraph to enhance readability. Increase the font size to 16 points and highlight the text with the hex code #FF00FF for visual impact.
rewrite3:
Please adjust the formatting as follows:

- Center the text in the tenth paragraph and switch its font to Calibri.
- In the fourth paragraph, apply a Level 1 Outline style. Change the font color to hex code #FFFF00 and highlight the text with hex code #FF00FF. Also, italicize the text for emphasis.
- For the eighth paragraph, insert an 8-point space before and after to enhance readability. Increase the font size to 16 points, and apply a text highlight using hex code #FF00FF.
